sourcesContent:
import React, {useState,useEffect} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' export default (props)=> { var [UserData,setStateUserData]=useState({}); let {idno} = useParams(); //Destructing let { id , name , mail , phone } = UserData //Updating Api Data into UserData useEffect(()=>{ const url = `http://localhost:3001/users/${idno}` axios.get(url).then((result) =>setStateUserData(result.data)) },[]) //Props History In Hooks console.log(idno) return (<>

User_View_Data

{idno} th Record Data

ID Name Mail Phone
{id} {name} {mail} {phone}
GoTo Back
) }
